Service Details: - This park offers a beachfront with swimming area, hiking, biking, lakeshore and grassland trails with views of Okanagan Lake, intermittent creek beds- Signed dog beach areas (follow signs from lower parking area)
Address & Map: 3041 Collens Hill RdWest Kelowna, BC     V1Z 1P6
Major Intersection: Collens Hill Rd and Lakeview Rd
